sarah.text: q8m completely transformed my interview preparation. The structured approach and real-time feedback helped me land my dream job at Google. I couldn't have done it without this platform!
sarah.name: Sarah Chen

michael.text: After months of struggling with random LeetCode problems, q8m showed me the patterns. Within 2 weeks, I was solving problems I couldn't even approach before. Highly recommended!
michael.name: Michael Rodriguez

emma.text: The interactive learning experience and comprehensive coverage of frontend technologies made all the difference. I went from failing interviews to getting multiple offers!
emma.name: Emma Thompson

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: q8m ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform for frontend development interview preparation.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, take quizzes, or contact us for support:
personal.name: Full name

usage.title: Usage Information
usage.content: We automatically collect certain information about your use of our platform:

informationUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
informationUsage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services:
informationUsage.service: Provide and maintain our quiz platform
informationUsage.communication: Send you updates, notifications, and support communications
informationUsage.improvement: Analyze usage patterns to improve our services
informationUsage.security: Ensure the security and integrity of our platform

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
informationSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following limited circumstances:
informationSharing.noSell: We never sell your personal information to third parties.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information:
dataSecurity.encryption: Data encryption in transit and at rest

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have certain rights regarding your personal information:
yourRights.access: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
yourRights.correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
yourRights.deletion: Request deletion of your personal data
yourRights.portability: Request data portability to another service

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience:
cookies.analytics: Analytics cookies to understand usage patterns
cookies.preferences: Preference cookies to remember your settings

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

cta.title: Ready to Start Learning?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of developers who have mastered frontend interviews with q8m.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our platform. By using q8m, you agree to be bound by these terms.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to q8m, a professional platform for frontend development interview preparation. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our website and services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our services.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.content: q8m provides interview preparation services including:

features.interview: Interactive coding challenges and interview questions

registration.title: Account Registration
registration.content: To access certain features, you must create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.security: Maintain the security of your account credentials
responsibilities.activity: Take responsibility for all activities under your account

subscription.title: Subscription Services
subscription.content: Certain features require a paid subscription. Subscription fees are billed in advance and are non-refundable except as required by law.

billing.title: Billing and Renewal
billing.content: Subscriptions automatically renew unless cancelled before the renewal date. You can cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings.

refunds.title: Refund Policy
refunds.content: We offer refunds within 30 days of purchase for first-time subscribers. Refund requests must be made through our support team.

prohibitedUses.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibitedUses.content: You agree not to use our platform for any unlawful or prohibited purposes, including:
prohibitedUses.illegal: Any illegal activities or violations of applicable laws
prohibitedUses.harassment: Harassment, abuse, or harmful behavior toward other users
prohibitedUses.security: Attempting to breach security measures or access restricted areas
prohibitedUses.unauthorized: Unauthorized access to accounts or systems
prohibitedUses.automation: Use of automated tools to access or scrape our platform

ourContent.title: Our Content
ourContent.content: All content on our platform, including questions, explanations, and materials, is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.

userContent.title: User-Generated Content
userContent.content: You retain ownership of content you create, but grant us a license to use it for providing our services.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice, for:

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: Our services are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee job placement or interview success.

limitationLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationLiability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of Jordan, without regard to conflict of law principles.

changesTerms.title: Changes to Terms
changesTerms.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us:

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our pricing
faq.question1: Can I change my plan anytime?
faq.answer1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.
faq.question2: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer2: We accept PayPal, credit cards, and local payment methods for Middle Eastern countries.
faq.answer3: Yes, all paid plans come with a 7-day free trial. No credit card required.
faq.answer4: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll retain access until the end of your billing period.
faq.answer5: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, contact our support team.
faq.answer6: Yes, we offer special pricing for students. Contact our support team with your student ID for more information.

guarantee.title: 7-Day Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.description: Not satisfied? Get a full refund within 7 days, no questions asked.
